sentences.en: a course designed primarily for specialists
sentences.cn: 主要为专业人员开设的课程

sentences.en: As ever, the meals are primarily fish-based.
sentences.cn: 像往常一样，饭菜主要是鱼。

sentences.en: But throughout the colonies, people relied primarily on small farms and self - sufficiency .
sentences.cn: 但就整个殖民地来说, 人们主要依靠小型农场,过着 自给自足 的生活.

sentences.en: Flycatchers feed primarily on winged insects.
sentences.cn: 鹟主要以有翅昆虫为食。

sentences.en: Her wardrobe consists primarily of huge cashmere sweaters and tiny Italian sandals.
sentences.cn: 她的衣物主要是宽大的开司米毛衣和小巧的意大利凉鞋。

sentences.en: I am primarily interested in history.
It seems almost inevitable that North African economies will still be primarily oriented towards Europe.
sentences.cn: 看来北非经济体几乎注定还将以欧洲为主导。

sentences.en: Many remedies effective in joint disease are primarily diuretic.
sentences.cn: 许多对关节病有效的药品主要含有利尿成分。

sentences.en: Modern English derives primarily from one of the dialects of Anglo - Saxon.
sentences.cn: 现代英语起源于盎格鲁 - 撒克逊语的多种方言之一.

sentences.en: Money will be directed primarily towards the maintenance and rehabilitation of schools, clinics and machinery.
sentences.cn: 资金将主要用于学校、诊所和机器设备的维护和修缮。

sentences.en: She sees exercise primarily as an unavoidable chore.
sentences.cn: 她基本上把锻炼看做是不得不做的琐事。

sentences.en: The advertisement is aimed primarily at children.
sentences.cn: 这则广告的对象主要是儿童。

sentences.en: The advertising campaign is aimed primarily at young people.
sentences.cn: 这个广告宣传运动主要是针对年轻人的.

sentences.en: The body is made up primarily of bone, muscle, and fat.
sentences.cn: 人体主要是由骨骼、肌肉和脂肪构成。

sentences.en: The inves-tigation was undertaken primarily to mollify pressure groups.
sentences.cn: 展开调查主要是为了安抚那些压力集团。

sentences.en: The investigation was undertaken primarily to mollify pressure groups.
sentences.cn: 展开调查主要是为了安抚那些压力集团。

words.tran_cn: 被压抑童年情绪的释放
初期；青年；精华；全盛时期
释放（被压抑的童年情绪）

trans.tran_cn: 首先，首要地，主要地，根本上，本来
